channel.title: Lee Whalen on Devops Engineers
channel.description: Recent content in Lee Whalen on Devops Engineers

item.title: Resume Optimization
item.description: A great tech resume isn’t just a rote recitation of “what I did, when I did it”, it’s a vehicle for crafting a story and making a connection with the string of humans handling it from the time you hit ‘Submit’, to the time you click ‘Accept’ on that first interview invite.
